testingPlatform.description: Image used for testing. Currently available: [java, python]

gitStudentRepo.description: URL or ssh for student repository

gitTestSource.description: URL or ssh for test repository. (This is rarely needed)

hash.description: Specify hash to test that specific hash. Otherwise the latest hash of student repository will be tested.

uniid.description: Default is second from the end in url. https://gitlab.cs.ttu.ee/envomp/iti0102-2019.git > uniid = envomp. Specify uniid, if its not second from end

project.description: Default is last in url. https://gitlab.cs.ttu.ee/envomp/iti0102-2019.git > project = iti0102-2019. Specify project, if its not in last position.

dockerExtra.description: No defaults. You can add (stylecheck) or something. It is sent to smaller tester. Look the possibilities from the small tester repository for more details.

systemExtra.description: No defaults. You can add (noMail, noTesterFiles, noStd, noFeedback)
